name: EnigmaSeven-Web
description:
EnigmaSeven-Web

Windows version available @ https://soumyaratna-debnath.itch.io/enigmaseven

Reality is an Enigma, Time is an Enigma, Existence is an Enigma. 

Inspired by the seven stages of life, the game introduce you to some logical puzzles, with hidden meanings.

The game is one of a kind, and is based upon the theme 'Out of Control'. Your sole aim in the game will be to take control over the logic behind each level in order to proceed to the next. 

Don't forget to dig for the hidden meanings and humor.

Let EnigmaSeven make a difference in your life.

Spoiler - Only if you are finding it difficult to play. 

Don't simply try to solve the level and proceed to the next. Firstly, play to figure out what each button does, and then try to solve the puzzle. Try to master the logic of a particular level before proceeding to the next. If you don't do so, you will surely get stuck somewhere and hence will have to start-over. 

Once you understand the patterns and the logic behind the patterns, each level then will open up some hidden meanings. Always remember, the game maintains the hierarchy of 'seven stages of life', and expects you to look at it that way.
